definition: noun: total lack of meaning or ideas
example: Bill's poem was nothing more than a list of impressive sounding words, so there was no point in trying to take meaning from the inanity.
mnemonic: Inanity - In-a-night = Work done in just a night is usually lacking so it's a bad idea.

example: Even the most percipient editor will make an occasional error when proofreading.
mnemonic: perci mean a person who understand so he is highly percipient
